vote.title: To authorize the Director of Finance and Management to enter into a subrecipient agreement with Capital Crossroads Special Improvement District to provide funding to the organization for the downtown portable public restrooms in the amount of $34,502.00; to authorize the expenditure of up to $34,502.00 from the American Rescue Plan Act Supplemental Coronovirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund; and to declare an emergency.  ($34,502.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
